text: Beauvois is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A small village located 30 miles (50 km) west- northwest of Arras at the junction of the D104 with the D99 road. ==Population== Population history 1962 1968 1975 1982 1990 1999 110 136 130 126 120 125 Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting Census count starting from 1962 : Population without double counting ==Places of interest== * The church of St.Jean-Baptiste, dating from the 19th century. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==Other websites== * Beauvois on the Quid website Category:Communes in Pas-de- Calais
title: Beauvois, Pas-de-Calais
